TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolReflector extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供各种通信协议的公共功能，以从标识为 Web 服务的类创建 对象。

span.span: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象类和派生的类创建其具体从标识为与 Web 服务的类的对象属性。The abstract class and its concrete derived classes create objects from classes that are identified as Web services with the attribute. 每个具体-派生的类生成对象根据指定的通信协议;提供了常用的功能，不考虑的协议。Each concrete -derived class generates objects according to a specified communication protocol; provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. 输出实例可以用于生成 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档与方法或可用的重载之一。An output instance can be used to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document with the method or one of the available overloads. 实例还可通过类和相关的类来生成客户端代理代码，或者抽象服务器代码。The instance can also be used by the class and related classes to generate client proxy code or abstract server code. 类使用创建它每个绑定识别中的 Web 服务类。The class uses the to create a for each binding it identifies in the Web service class. 如果该属性不存在，类创建整个类的一个绑定。If that attribute is not present, the class creates a single binding for the entire class. 针对每个 Web 服务方法 (与显示的 Web 服务类中的方法) 属于一个绑定，从派生的类生成某一操作和关联的消息添加到对象。For each Web service method (a method in the Web service class appearing with the ) belonging to a binding, a class derived from generates an operation and associated messages that are added to the object. 通常情况下，开发人员可以使用这些类间接通过类，而不是直接调用类派生自。Typically, a developer uses these classes indirectly through the class, instead of directly invoking classes derived from .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，在 为绑定的每个方法调用 方法之前执行处理。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs processing before calls the method for each of the methods for a binding.

span.span: The default namespace, as identified by the associated object's property.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs processing after has called the method for each of the methods for a binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription GetServiceDescription(string ns) cil managed
Public Function GetServiceDescription (ns As String) As ServiceDescription

param.name: ns
param.span: 随后获取的 实例将使用与 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 实体（该实体从输入 Web 服务类反射）对应的对象来填充。

span.span: The instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to Web Services Description Language (WSDL) entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

summary.span: 获取给定的 XML 命名空间和适用的通信协议的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.

returns.span: 给定的 XML 命名空间和适用的通信协议的 对象。

span.span: A object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 随后获取的实例获取填充了对应于输入的 Web 服务类中反映的 WSDL 实体的对象。The instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to WSDL entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类创建对象每个绑定，具有不同的命名空间，它在 Web 服务类中找到。The class creates a object for each binding, with a distinct namespace, that it finds in a Web service class.
